segments.text: What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to have a sightseeing tour in South Africa . Do you provide a package tour ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What interesting places shall we visit ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'll visit the generally well-known spots .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many days shall we spend on the trip ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Five days ' time will be OK .
segments.speaker: S1
